page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [Spain][VOIP] - Interconnect
incidents.message: Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC End Time : 2022/04/26 08:30 UTC Service impact : Following this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error. There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers. Current status : Resolved A patch has been deployed. The situation is back to its state prior the incident.
incidents.timestamp: Apr <var data-var='date'>6</var>, <var data-var='time'>09:30</var> - Apr <var data-var='date'>26</var>, <var data-var='time'>08:43</var> UTC

incidents.name: [RBX][VOIP] Carrier SIP
incidents.message: Start Time : 07/03/2022 08:30 UTC End Time : 07/03/2022 08:41 UTC Service impact : Outgoing calls to Carrier SIP RBX were not available Root Cause : A DNS latency on our cluster impacted outgoing calls routing via Carrier SIP RBX. Carrier SIP SBG was fully available during the incident, SBG region was able to handle customer outgoing calls. We plan to strengthen DNS caching for both Carrier SIP zones to improve our service resilience.
